How to Install pycorrfit on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • pycorrfit

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install pycorrfit on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing pycorrfit on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall pycorrfit in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install pycorrfit, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install pycorrfit Using apt

To install pycorrfit in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install pycorrfit using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install pycorrfit

The installation of pycorrfit might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install pycorrfit Using apt-get

To install pycorrfit using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install pycorrfit.

sudo apt-get -y install pycorrfit

Install pycorrfit Using Synaptic

To install pycorrfit using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install pycorrfit on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for pycorrfit. This will display the pycorrfit package in the package window, now to install pycorrfit, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the pycorrfit package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of pycorrfit.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install pycorrfit Using aptitude

To install pycorrfit on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of pycorrfit.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install pycorrfit using the command aptitude install pycorrfit.

sudo aptitude -y install pycorrfit

How to Upgrade pycorrfit on debian

If you want to upgrade the pycorrfit package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade pycorrfit using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade pycorrfit to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade pycorrfit.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade pycorrfit sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade pycorrfit

Upgrade pycorrfit using Aptitude

To upgrade pycorrfit using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade pycorrfit.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade pycorrfit

Upgrade pycorrfit using Synaptic

To upgrade pycorrfit using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for pycorrfit, now right-click pycorrfit, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade pycorrfit just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall pycorrfit on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall pycorrfit from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just pycorrfit, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove pycorrfit

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of pycorrfit

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of pycorrfit you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge pycorrfit

Remove pycorrfit using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall pycorrfit using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for pycorrfit, right-click the pycorrfit package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall pycorrfit click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install pycorrfit on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade pycorrfit using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of pycorrfit then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
